properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maranatha, Lord we seek you. Every heart here waits as one. Lord, draw near us, for we need You. Maranatha, O Lord Jesus, come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord come, O Lord come. We await Your presence, O Lord come. Come and meet us. We long to see You. Maranatha, O Lord Jesus, come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where Your people join together, Lord, Your Spirit fills that place. You are here now, Lord forever Now in Spirit but one day face to face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord come, O Lord come. We await Your presence, O Lord come. Come and meet us. We long to see You. Maranatha, O Lord Jesus, come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now we watch, Lord, for Your appearing. When the veil is torn away. As we see our freedom nearing May this prayer grow stronger every day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord come, O Lord come. We await Your presence, O Lord come. Come and meet us. We long to see You. Maranatha, O Lord Jesus, come.{/lang-eng}
